key_themes: Technical support tests at critical levels
Rate policy uncertainty driving sector rotation
Extreme fear sentiment creating contrarian setups

QQQ loss of $610 support activates dormant put hedging
Bitcoin failure at $89k invalidates bullish structure per Twitter
Geopolitical escalation (Taiwan-China, Russia-Ukraine) triggering risk-off flows
Earnings guidance cuts in consumer discretionary and enterprise software spreading contagion
analysis.intraday_levels: SPY: $680 immediate support (5k OI), $670 Put Wall major support (13k OI). Resistance at $690 (7k OI). QQQ: $610 Put Wall critical (6k OI), breakdown risk if lost. Watch for dealer hedging activity at active levels.
analysis.swing_levels: SPY: $670 Max Pain gravitational pull, $661 deeper support (9k OI). Upside capped at $695 Call Wall (7k OI), $700 psychological. QQQ: $610-$625 range likely, Max Pain $625 target. Resistance at $635-$640 cluster. Bitcoin: $89k support hold critical per Twitter for bullish structure.
